resources.string: Tip: Add the Quick Settings tile \n(pull down from top edge ▸ Edit tiles ▸ drag “No Glasses”).
Pick your big text size. Then you will be able to tap the Quick Settings tile to toggle instantly between your normal size and the big size.

No Glasses lets you toggle between your normal text size and a larger one, via a Quick Settings tile.


It is free, ad-free, and open source. No data is shared with us, advertisers, or any third parties—only the usual information with Google.


Project page: https://app-muon.github.io//noglassesmode
